question: At what rate do people who are cyberbullied tell their family or someone they trust about being cyberbullied?
description: Only one in ten people who are cyberbullied tell others about it. That's a pretty small percentage, isn't it?

question: What is the percentage of peope who stated that they were threated in an online game is?
description: Almost one in two people who play online games experience cyberbullying.

question: What is the rate of cyberbullying among young people in the world?
description: One in every two young people is cyberbullied. Even one of your friends can be a cyberbullying victim!

question: What is the rate of students being exposed to cyberbullying in school groupchats?
description: 7 out of 10 people in a class groupchat have been cyberbullied in some way. Cyberbullying is everywhere!

question: What is the rate of cyberbullying victim knowing the cyberbully?
description: Since cyberbullying occurs over the internet, we think it is often done by someone we do not know. How high is the rate of finding someone we know!
